segments.text: This kitchen scene is unfolding right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman is polishing that plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's oblivious to the faucet running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the sink edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is forming, and it's getting bigger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has one foot in the water, but keeps drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that shaky stool, stretching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He shouldn't be doing that; it's dangerous!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is helping him by reaching up too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinets might get ruined from the water.
segments.speaker: PAR
